summary: just a little mod unpretentious to offer you my vision of the rogue in the far north. Dark but \"RP\" (I think).
descriptionHtml:
Hi all!


--Description--


I\'m sorry for my English. I just wanted to share my character with the Community.
A rogue \"kikoodark\". Can be a bit \"too much\" but I like that.

I also add a data folder to place in the \"skyrim\" folder of the game. I\'ve placed a minimod to change the skin of Dragonscale Armor (light armor) with the Ulfric clothes. 
 in order to complete the perk (light armor).

You also have in inventory, real armor Ulfric for the start of the game

I find that with this armor you really feel like playing a rogue in the far north. 

(I do not pretend to be a great modder, I bring just my contribution I hope to be, appreciated.)

Enjoy !

(sorry for my english another time...)





--Installation--



__1) Put the save file in the save folder; C:/users/\"user name\"/my documents/My games/Skyrim/saves
(Maybe you\'ll have to rename the save file. Look the others files on the folder).


__2) Put the data folder in the skyrim folder;  steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim .






--The armor on your own save--



1) You have to know how add an item in your inventory.
Open the console with Â² .
The command is:  player.additem ID NUMBER  
ex: player.additem 000f1ac1  2 (if you want two katanas).

2) ID List

00062303 (armor)
0005DB88 (helmet)
0010EB5C (boots)
0010EB5E (gloves)
000f1ac1 (katana) 

3) Armor is Ulfric clothes and as all the clothes you have no stats (no armor). So download the data folder and put it in your skyrim folder.
Next you have to enter \"player.additem 1393e 1\" in the console to add a dragonscale armor (light armor) in your inventory with the Ulfric clothes skin.

4) Go backstab !




Thx to \"Dark_Wound\" on Jeuxvideo.com \' Skyrim Forum for the mod that allows to change the skin of the Dragonscale Armor.



EDIT: For black boots and gloves you have to DL;  Dark Brotherhood Apparel No Colour by Glexn http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=168
author: nicow33
